section.name: News
section.p: Version 3.0 has been released, as of 2003-12-08. Things were refactored to break many of the packages out as their own jars. Many deprecated classes were removed and work put into making the site feel structured.
Version 2.2 has been released, as of 2003-08-12. The following features were added:

ul.li: Added first set of unit tests.
Added a RunMain class which runs main(String[]) methods in a new Thread.
Deprecated various classes and methods and made various other small improvements.
